reviews.review: It's Portal but their are two of em now
Вы умертвили своего приятеля кубика быстрее,чем кто либо из предыдущих испытуемых,это рекорд.
я по играл не множко в игру всё нормально играть можно прикольная игра топ игра всем советаю по играть пока есть скидка potal 2
so good it makes me sad. we may never have another valve game as good as this.
nao entendo nada mas sempre consigo passar na cagada
you aren't a gamer if you havent played this game

Melhor relação preço-qualidade num jogo que alguma vez tenha comprado (1.63€).
Com inúmeros puzzles e quebra-cabeças!
Para além no modo história e cooperativo oficial do jogo, ainda tem uma vasta quantidade de mapas à escolha no workshop.
Recomendo 
9/10
神来之笔，我是一路闯关，到后面实在不行看的攻略，哈哈，套用太君翻译官的一句话：“告，实在是高。”
masterpiece of a game, the story is amazing and intriguing

One of the best puzzle games (and games in general) in principle! Ever since I was a kid, I loved the first part of the series, which only took me an hour or an hour and a half to complete. Here... Everything has been polished to the IDEAL: graphics that are still a joy to watch (the game is over 10 years old), interesting story, charismatic and memorable characters, balanced quests, awesome co-op - it's all here in Portal 2! There aren't many such legendary games coming out these days, but Valve just made me idolize this game! Like 👍

This game is by far, one of the best games I have played in a long time. The graphics are amazing and the it is a very interesting puzzle game. It is a very humorous and fun strategy game. I did get stuck at some bits, it is a very hard game. But if you ask me, it is 100% worth your money.
Ha ha! Portal gun go Brrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr!

like one portal? how about two portals!!!!
10/10
it is very fun even tho its a old game

This is literally my favorite game of all time. Between the game itself, lore, achievements, cooperative testing, and community made mods, this game never gets old and I could, and have, played it for hours on end. Portal Two holds a special place in my heart, now and forever, and I think everyone should play it, even just once. Thank you Valve for making a game I will always love and never forget.

Simplesmente o melhor jogo de puzzle já inventado 
Tanto o modo singleplayer e o multiplayer são fenomenais
E a comunidade é incrível fazendo seus próprios mapas e alguns até fizeram sua "DLC" como o portal stories:mel que eu achei muito bom
(Eu sei que tem o portal reloaded, mas eu ainda não joguei ele, então não posso opinar)
E ainda tem mais mods que parecem ser dlc, como , Portal Revoluiton e Portal Community Edition
Hem hikayesi mükemmel hem oynanışı mükemmel. Arkadaşlarınız ile oynamak içinde çok uygun. 8saat arkadaşım ile oynadım :))
very cool game just got for the retarded

I played this years ago on the Xbox with one of my best friends. Being able to play it again brought back so many memories. Good and bad. 

It is a fun story driven puzzle adventure. Some puzzles more thought provoking than others. Plus a CO-OP mode. I highly recommend it to anyone who enjoys a fun challenge.
Pokud máte pevné nervy tak doporučuji
its a good game theres alot of puzzels so you need to use teamwork to help you out on stuff
Pleins d'énigmes, les uns plus fous que les autres, en plus, l'ambiance et les dialogues sont ahurissants, j'adore ce jeu !
10/10 Wish it was longer so I can play longer.
I didnt beat Portal 2 but its still cool.
oc wheatley bütün insani duygularımı elimden aldı
Joguinho bom dms, msm antigo e já tendo jogado, ainda frita a cabeça de pensar no multiplayer com meu amigo.
De fato um jogo da Valve
Absolute masterpiece of a game. Great story combined with great gameplay elements. You dont even need to have played the first portal game to understand the story although it does help.
If you want a cake, just go to Publix.
Лучшая игра говоломка за последние лет 10!

Portal 2 consegue misturar puzzles com mecânicas inovadoras, historia envolvente e engraçada, personagens carismáticos e trilha sonora muito boa. Ainda tem os mapa feitos pela comunidade, alguns com tanta qualidade que é como se fosse uma dlc gratuita, sem falar do modo co-op que é muito divertido para jogar com algum amigo. Isso tudo por 5 reais quando fica na promoção.

I never wrote a review before because I couldn't say anything that hadn't already been said. Well, screw that. Portal 2 is well-written, well-designed, and well-acted. It is as close to perfect as a game can be. it's funny, it's tragic, it's suspenseful, it's engaging. The ending brings me to tears every time I play it. The whole thing is just so perfect.

An experience that is hard to rival. Brilliantly designed like every other Valve game with just the right amount of humor to make you laugh thru most of the otherwise filler portions of the game. Can't recommend enough!
Amazing game and co-op was as good.
Wadą może być to że trzeba użyć mózgu.
What can I say? It's a Valve game, of course it's good.

10/10. bunea historia y bonito final, pero lo mejor de todo es:
receta de sopaipillas de zapallo:
para pasarlas en chancaca,

1 pan de chancaca (en EEUU Panela o Piloncillo Goya)
2 tazas de agua
cáscara de limón o naranja 2 pedacitos o a gusto
1 palito de canela
3 clavos de olor
2 cucharadas de maicena disueltas en 1/4 taza de agua fría
Colocar en una olla mediana el agua, la chancaca, cáscara de naranja, canela y clavos de harina. Cocinar a fuego medio revolviendo ocasionalmente hasta que se derrita la chancaca. Dejar hervir suavemente unos 15 minutos.
Si la desean mas espesa, agregar la maicena disuelta en agua fría y revolver hasta que espese.
Pueden solo rociar las sopaipillas con la salsa o colocarlas dentro de la salsa y servirlas tibias.
this game makes me think i'm stupid

me queme el cerebro para completarlo pero valio la pena
Fajna gra logiczna do pogrania z kumplem
oyun çok güzel bide arkadaslarla oynadığında çok iyi

Eughh what would I do without portal 2 guides on YouTube ✋😩 and also, the in-game voice chat is the most disgusting, gross and yack thing in the entire world of in-game voice chats. But probably have fun haha go buy and get smarter !
